parameters.name: network_discovery_reference
parameters.description: Enter the reference for network_discovery

parameters.name: _function
parameters.description: Select the function

address.description: The IPv4 Address or IPv6 Address of the device.

address_ref.description: The ref to management IP address of the device.

cap_admin_status_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the admin status of an interface of the device.

cap_admin_status_na_reason.description: The reason that the edit admin status action is not available.

cap_description_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the description of an interface on the device.

cap_description_na_reason.description: The reason that the edit description action is not available.

cap_net_deprovisioning_ind.description: Determines whether to deprovision a network from interfaces of the device.

cap_net_deprovisioning_na_reason.description: The reason that the deprovision a network from interfaces of this device is not available.

cap_net_provisioning_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the network associated to an interface of the device.

cap_net_provisioning_na_reason.description: The reason that network provisioning is not available.

cap_net_vlan_provisioning_ind.description: Determines whether to create a VLAN and then provision a network to the interface of the device.

cap_net_vlan_provisioning_na_reason.description: The reason that network provisioning on VLAN is not available.

cap_vlan_assignment_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the VLAN assignement of an interface of the device.

cap_vlan_assignment_na_reason.description: The reason that VLAN assignment action is not available.

cap_voice_vlan_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the voice VLAN assignment of an interface of the device.

cap_voice_vlan_na_reason.description: The reason that voice VLAN assignment action is not available.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

model.description: The model name of the device.

ms_ad_user_data.description: The Microsoft Active Directory user related information.

network.description: The ref to the network to which belongs the management IP address belongs.

network_infos.description: The list of networks to which the device interfaces belong.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which this device resides.

networks.description: The list of networks to which the device interfaces belong.

os_version.description: The Operating System version running on the device.

port_stats.description: The port statistics of the device.

vendor.description: The vendor name of the device.

vlan_infos.description: The list of VLAN information associated with the device.

description.description: The description of the device component.

device.description: A reference to a device, to which this component belongs to.

model.description: The model of the device component.

serial.description: The serial number of the device component.

admin_status_task_info.description: The configured admin status task info of the interface.

cap_if_admin_status_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the admin status of the interface.

cap_if_admin_status_na_reason.description: The reason that the edit admin status action is not available.

cap_if_description_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the description of the interface.

cap_if_description_na_reason.description: The reason that the edit description action is not available.

cap_if_net_deprovisioning_ipv4_ind.description: Determines whether to deprovision a IPv4 network from the interfaces.

cap_if_net_deprovisioning_ipv4_na_reason.description: The reason that the deprovision a IPv4 network from the interface.

cap_if_net_deprovisioning_ipv6_ind.description: Determines whether to deprovision a IPv6 network from the interfaces.

cap_if_net_deprovisioning_ipv6_na_reason.description: The reason that the deprovision a IPv6 network from the interface.

cap_if_net_provisioning_ipv4_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the IPv4 network associated to the interface.

cap_if_net_provisioning_ipv4_na_reason.description: The reason that IPv4 network provisioning is not available.

cap_if_net_provisioning_ipv6_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the IPv6 network associated to the interface.

cap_if_net_provisioning_ipv6_na_reason.description: The reason that IPv6 network provisioning is not available.

cap_if_vlan_assignment_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the VLAN assignement of the interface.

cap_if_vlan_assignment_na_reason.description: The reason that VLAN assignment action is not available.

cap_if_voice_vlan_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the voice VLAN assignement of the interface.

cap_if_voice_vlan_na_reason.description: The reason that voice VLAN assignment action is not available.

description_task_info.description: The configured description task info of the interface.

device.description: The ref to the device to which the interface belongs.

duplex.description: The duplex state of the interface.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

ifaddr_infos.description: List of IFaddr information associated with the interface.

index.description: The interface index number, as reported by SNMP.

last_change.description: Timestamp of the last interface property change detected.

link_aggregation.description: This field indicates if this is a link aggregation interface.

mac.description: The MAC address of the interface.

ms_ad_user_data.description: The Microsoft Active Directory user related information.

network_view.description: Th name of the network view.

port_fast.description: The Port Fast status of the interface.

reserved_object.description: The reference to object(Host/FixedAddress/GridMember) to which this port is reserved.

trunk_status.description: Indicates if the interface is tagged as a VLAN trunk or not.

vlan_info_task_info.description: The configured VLAN status task info of the interface.

vlan_infos.description: The list of VLAN information associated with the interface.

vrf_description.description: The description of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

vrf_name.description: The name of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

vrf_rd.description: The route distinguisher of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

address.description: The IPv4 Address or IPv6 Address of the device neighbor.

address_ref.description: The ref to the management IP address of the device neighbor.

device.description: The ref to the device to which the device neighbor belongs.

interface.description: The ref to the interface to which the device neighbor belongs.

mac.description: The MAC address of the device neighbor.

name.description: The name of the device neighbor.

vlan_infos.description: The list of VLAN information associated with the device neighbor.

author.description: The developer of the device support bundle.

integrated_ind.description: Determines whether the device support bundle is integrated or imported. Note that integrated support bundles cannot be removed.

name.description: The descriptive device name for the device support bundle.

version.description: The version of the currently active device support bundle.

community_string.description: The SNMP community string of the discovery diagnostic task.

debug_snmp.description: The SNMP debug flag of the discovery diagnostic task.

force_test.description: The force test flag of the discovery diagnostic task.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the discovery diagnostic task.

network_view.description: The network view name of the discovery diagnostic task.

start_time.description: The time when the discovery diagnostic task was started.

task_id.description: The ID of the discovery diagnostic task.

dns_lookup_option.description: The type of the devices the DNS processor operates on.

dns_lookup_throttle.description: The percentage of available capacity the DNS processor operates at. Valid values are unsigned integer between 1 and 100, inclusive.

enable_auto_conversion.description: The flag that enables automatic conversion of discovered data.

enable_auto_updates.description: The flag that enables updating discovered data for managed objects.

ignore_conflict_duration.description: Determines the timeout to ignore the discovery conflict duration (in seconds).

same_port_control_discovery_blackout.description: Determines if the same port control is used for discovery blackout.

snmpv1v2_credentials.description: Discovery SNMP v1 and v2 credentials.

unmanaged_ips_limit.description: Limit of discovered unmanaged IP address which determines how frequently the user is notified about the new unmanaged IP address in a particular network.

unmanaged_ips_timeout.description: Determines the timeout between two notifications (in seconds) about the new unmanaged IP address in a particular network. The value must be between 60 seconds and the number of seconds remaining to Jan 2038.

vrf_mapping_policy.description: The policy type used to define the behavior of the VRF mapping.

address.description: The Grid member address IP address.

discovery_member.description: The name of the network discovery Grid member.

enable_service.description: Determines if the discovery service is enabled.

is_sa.description: Determines if the standalone mode for discovery network monitor is enabled or not.

scan_interfaces.description: Discovery networks to which the member is assigned.

snmpv1v2_credentials.description: Discovery SNMP v1 and v2 credentials.

address.description: The IPv4 Address or IPv6 Address of the device.

cli_collection_enabled.description: Indicates if CLI collection is enabled.

existence_info.description: The existence status information of the device.

fingerprint_enabled.description: Indicates if DHCP finterprinting is enabled.

fingerprint_info.description: This DHCP finterprinting status information of the device.

first_seen.description: The timestamp when the device was first discovered.

last_action.description: The timestamp of the last detected interface property change.

last_seen.description: The timestamp when the device was last discovered.

last_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the last executed action for the device.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which this device resides.

reachable_info.description: The reachable status information of the device.

snmp_collection_enabled.description: Indicates if SNMP collection is enabled.

snmp_collection_info.description: The SNMP collection status information of the device.

snmp_credential_info.description: The SNMP credential status information of the device.

status.description: The overall status of the device.

device.description: The device to which the VRF belongs.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which this VRF resides.

route_distinguisher.description: The route distinguisher associated with the VRF.

csv_file_name.description: The network discovery CSV file name.

disable_ip_scanning.description: Determines whether IP scanning is disabled.

disable_vmware_scanning.description: Determines whether VMWare scanning is disabled.

member_name.description: The Grid member that runs the discovery.

merge_data.description: Determines whether to replace or merge new data with existing data.

network_view.description: Name of the network view in which target networks for network discovery reside.

networks.description: The list of the networks on which the network discovery will be invoked.

ping_retries.description: The number of times to perfrom ping for ICMP and FULL modes.

ping_timeout.description: The ping timeout for ICMP and FULL modes.

scheduled_run.description: The schedule setting for network discovery task.

state_time.description: Time when the network discovery process state was last updated.

status.description: The network discovery process descriptive status.

status_time.description: The time when the network discovery process status was last updated.

tcp_ports.description: The ports to scan for FULL and TCP modes.

tcp_scan_technique.description: The TCP scan techinque for FULL and TCP modes.

v_network_view.description: Name of the network view in which target networks for VMWare scanning reside.

vservers.description: The list of VMware vSphere servers for VM discovery.
